The implementation of the 
[Swiss Geoinformation Strategy (SGS)](https://www.geo.admin.ch/de/strategie-und-umsetzung) 
began in 2020. In February, the 
[Coordinating Agency for Federal Geographical Information, GCG](https://www.geo.admin.ch/en/organisation-names-departments-contacts) 
and the [Conference of the Cantonal Geoinformation and Cadastral Offices](https://www.kgk-cgc.ch) (KGK / CGC)
published [this year's SGS action plan](https://spatialists.ch/posts/2025/02-17-sgs-action-plan-2025/) 
([German](https://backend.geoinformation.ch/fileservice/sdweb-docs-prod-geoinformatch-files/files/2025/01/23/49235a42-7d56-4273-ae71-cebe5826e07f.pdf) / 
[French](https://backend.geoinformation.ch/fileservice/sdweb-docs-prod-geoinformatch-files/files/2025/01/23/e53a9a71-78da-463f-87fa-697cf4d9169b.pdf)).

On May 2, Swisstopo will host a [colloquium to present the current state of SGS 
implementation and ongoing SGS projects](https://www.swisstopo.admin.ch/de/strategie-geoinformation-schweiz). This event will take place both in Wabern and online.
